overview: The two funny and furry little creatures Kiwi and Strit live in the forest. Kiwi is careful and yellow, while Strit is wild and purple, and they have very different approaches to everything. But they are both very playful and curious. Two great characters who see snow for the first time make the best of winter. They ski, sled, play snowball fight, and do it all in their unique way.
title: Kiwi & Strit - Winter Edition
